EmailTemplate.subject: Recording now available from our recent mental health webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Understanding and bridging gaps in your clients’ mental health care offerings
Image Mature woman waving at tablet
We’re sorry you missed our recent webinar about mental health care. The good news is that we recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime! Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any questions about any of our virtual care solutions.
Watch the webinar <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/62856efe7481c30551555cbe]]>
Watch the webinar and get ready for your selling season with: An overview of the mental health care landscape and the challenges it presents for small and mid-size employers A deep understanding of the coaching, clinical and crisis management components of our stepped-care approach Updates on mental health crisis management and adolescent mental health solutions
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
